paper_title: Some fast convergent series for the mathematical constants $ζ(4)$ and $ζ(5)$
abstract: Recently, Sun [preprint, arXiv: 2210.07238v7] proposed two conjectural series for the mathematical constant $ζ(4)$ and two conjectural series for the mathematical constant $ζ(5)$. In terms of the operator method and two hypergeometric transformations, we prove these four conjectures. Furthermore, we also find some new series for the two constants in this paper.
